Text: Farmer @,^^I am delighted to inform you of a recent development: JojaMart could have the summer seeds in stock a day in advance! Aren't you thrilled?^^I hope to see you tomorrow checking our stock to plan ahead!^^-Mr. Morris, Manager^Pelican Town JojaMart

Farmer @,^^I am delighted to inform you of a recent development: JojaMart could have the fall seeds in stock a day in advance! Aren't you thrilled?^^I hope to see you tomorrow checking our stock to plan ahead!^^-Mr. Morris, Manager^Pelican Town JojaMart

Farmer @,^^I am delighted to inform you of a recent development: JojaMart could have the spring seeds in stock a day in advance! Aren't you thrilled?^^I hope to see you tomorrow checking our stock to plan ahead!^^-Mr. Morris, Manager^Pelican Town JojaMart
